message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $150 by both myself and you, ensuring mutual satisfaction. Considering its high quality and functionality, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $140. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a saving of $10 compared to its original value. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Looking forward to your positive response.
